title: Soares
body: > This family name comes from Diogo Soares, who was the lord of Porto Santo, and from Manuel Soares, who founded the chapel of Senhora da Boa Morte in the church of S. Pedro in 1596.

Porto Santo: Location related to the Soares family name
S. Pedro: Location of the chapel of Senhora da Boa Morte

Manuel Soares: Founder of the chapel of Senhora da Boa Morte

1596: Foundation of the chapel of Senhora da Boa Morte by Manuel Soares
